title: Cargo does not react well to Unicode Characters in root folder with source code
body:
Hello all, I've created new cargo project in directory with Russian characters, tried to run it with `cargo run` and encountered a rather... confusing error. ## Reproduction 1. Create folder with any name with any non-ASCII Character 2. `cargo init` 3. `cargo run` 4. See the chaos unfold! This can be easily fixed by renaming every non-ASCII folder to ASCII-compliant names. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (20ffea693 2022-08-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: 20ffea6938b5839c390252e07940b99e3b6a889a commit-date: 2022-08-11 host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ```
